name: Im'mobile
description:
What do baby love ? Calm, peace and balance. Unfortunetly, this baby's parents know nothing about balance, and his mobile is all jamble up and unbalanced.
Attache the right toys in the right places for the mobile to be perfectly stable, and the baby will be finally able to enjoy the gracious and calming merry go round of the toys !

How to play :

  • In each level, you will face a different mobile
  • Place the different toys, each with a different weight, on the branch of the mobile
  • When the mobile is balanced, you win !

    Game made in 72h during the enjmin-training-camp jam.
